alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Pierce; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 5:20PM EDT until June 13 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Coffee County in southeastern Georgia... Northwestern Pierce County in southeastern Georgia... North central Ware County in southeastern Georgia... Bacon County in southeastern Georgia... South central Appling County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 520 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alma, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alma, Bristol, New Lacy and Bickley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
